name: OneShotTheDemonLord
description:
It's a Turn Based game where your objective is to kill the enemies with your final true goal to kill the demon lord. The catch is that you are out of control of what character you are playing as. You are basically playing every character on the grid but not at the same time. You can even complete the game as a Rock.

Of course everyone can beat it but ONE SHOTTING requires a strategy.

It has an average completion time of about 2-5 minutes.

Controls:

- Arrow Keys, WASD or Mouse for movement

- Space to restart room

Character Stats:

Orc - 3HP

Elf - 2HP

Hero - 2HP

Demon Lord - 10HP (Very Weak to Rocks)
